name: ListOfSingleRxNormCodeConceptsForHighRiskDrugsForTheElderly
title: List of Single RxNorm Code Concepts for High Risk Drugs for the Elderly
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent medication concepts considered as high risk for the elderly.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Medication, Ordered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with semantic clinical drugs (concepts associated with component, form and strength); generic; human use only; prescribable; medications considered high risk for the elderly.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes branded drugs; components or ingredient only; non-prescribable medications.)

concept.display: Dexbrompheniramine maleate 2 MG / Pseudoephedrine Hydrochloride 60 MG Oral Tablet
Naloxone 0.5 MG / Pentazocine 50 MG Oral Tablet
Chlordiazepoxide Hydrochloride 5 MG / Clidinium bromide 2.5 MG Oral Capsule
